meanings.sent1: The unheated water in the pool felt cold on my skin.
meanings.sent2: I prefer unheated sandwiches for lunch.
meanings.sent3: The unheated room made everyone shiver during the winter party.
meanings.sent4: Her unheated response to the news surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The unheated metal bench was uncomfortable to sit on in the chilly park.

meanings.sent1: The unheated coffee was not enjoyable to drink.
meanings.sent2: She wore unheated gloves and regretted it in the snow.
meanings.sent3: The unheated oven ruined the baking experiment.
meanings.sent4: His unheated enthusiasm for the project was evident to all.
meanings.sent5: The unheated soup was disappointing on a cold evening.
